name: Collect 4 cards to escape
description: In this game, player is trapped in a house and in order to escape he needs to collect 4 cards that contain instructions on how to escape. In order to get cards, he has to answer questions. For each correct answer, he gets one card. He can afford to give only one wrong answer. Hence, in order to successfully escape the house, he needs to answer correctly 4 out of 5 questions.
